summary: This bill, the District of Columbia Code Returning Citizens Coordination Act, mandates the Director of the Bureau of Prisons to provide specific information to the Mayor of the District of Columbia regarding individuals under the Bureau's jurisdiction, including their names, ages, Federal Register Numbers, housing facilities, and scheduled release dates. It also allows the Mayor to request information provided to the Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency.  The bill prohibits the Mayor from disclosing this information outside of the D.C. government, with limited exceptions.
